For all those using DT Lite or any other DT program, if you have issues with drag and drop procedures working, listen up.
1. Open DT.
2. Have an active virtual drive.
3. Right-click on it in interface.
4. Click mount.
5. At bottom select all file types.
6. Find your image and/or bin files.
7. Select and open.
8. Watch and behold it working finally.
9. Be happy.
